pageContent: Hi, is Edwin.

It varies, but lets say between 18 to month in revenue, Ive got about four clients, and I say about meaning lose one, gain one, lose one, gain two, lose one. Ive got a couple of stable ones, but people are people.

Yeah. These guys that make a lot of money selling leads.

A couple of things. One of the biggest reasons is when you get them too successful, theyve got a certain tolerance level. Theyre kind of like, oh, were good now. I had a tattoo company here in Las Vegas that had eight or ten tattoo artists. They were right on the Strip, but they werent on the Strip. They were off, but very close to the Strip. And so as the town was growing, there was all these new tattoo artists coming into town, and the competition was getting higher. They came to me going, hey, wed like to run some Facebook ads to kind of tap into digital media and get a little bit modern. We could use some more leads. I said, okay, so it took us about six weeks to kind of really nail it down, like, what worked and what didnt work, right? So we finally got in. Hey, were getting leads, and youre driving traffic to our website, and were getting more leads that way, because I saw the Facebook ad, and they wrote down our name. I was like, great. Fuck. Okay. Awesome. Weeks later, I got a phone call like, hey, guys, we got to stop the ads. Im like, what the fuck? I was like, Called me winning? He goes, oh, yeah. No, weve got so many leads now, and our Facebook page has grown, and our SEO has grown because weve gotten so many good reviews from all the people you drove. We dont need you guys anymore.

Whereas if I can have partners like you or whoever, that can help accelerate that because I dont make just money on my services. I also help them build and manage teams. I dont do everything for them as the fractional CMO. I dont build the website or build the funnel. My job is to go find people and go, hey, Im going to help you assemble a team almost like a general manager of a sports team. I dont coach the team. I build the team and then I manage. Do you see the difference? Like, Im not on the field telling the quarterback play to call. My job is to find the quarterback, to find the players, negotiate those contracts and go, okay, coach, heres the team I bought for you.

My goal is to get somebody whos really big and they like me and they keep me, and then I dont need to have to keep getting clients. But heres my idea. Would I stop the ads? Probably not, because now I could just sell my leads to another agency.
Just one lump sum or monthly?

Yes, every deal is a little bit different, but usually its a retainer. So that can go anywhere from 1500 a month to 10,000 a month depending on how many hours Im working and how many people I have to manage. So if its like a dental practice with three clinics, its going to be much more money because I have more people to manage and it requires more of my time depending on the laws of what can be paid or not because there are certain things you cant earn commission or splits on. So then Ill usually take a percentage of the sale in addition to that, which is my incentive because they now see, okay, Edwin is married to the brand. Hes not just providing a service, wiping his hands, going, well I did what I could do and I guess youre fucked. Right? Well if I get 5% on the back end, I can make a lot of money there and thats where I make my money. And theyre like, okay, so youre married to the brand, youre married to the outcome. We like that because youre in it to win it, right?
Okay. Yeah, 90 minutes. 2 hours. 2 hours. Even if its 2 hours, thats not a lot of time for me to spend to watch a video. So I dont have TV and I watch a lot of videos.
I do.

So there is a point that it would get too much for me personally. Theres only so many people I can service right myself. But the brands that I work for can service a lot of people, right? So lets say the bookkeeping company, I could bring on 50 to 100 clients in the next year. Theyd be totally fine. The Med tech company, if we figured out how to direct to consumer, we could bring on thousands or tens of thousands of patients into via various practices orthopedic practices. So if I ran a campaign that said, hey, contact your local orthopedist and your local rehab facility to see if they use this technology and ask them if they do, I could generate thousands of leads for these guys. So although Im capped personally, theres only so many companies I can help in a day. The companies that Im helping kind of in a pyramid of a hierarchy of system. I may only get one more client, but that client then needs 5000 clients or 2000 clients and I go, right, guess what? The way I got you is the way I can get you to get people right. Im just being real, whether we work together or not. Im just like my philosophy is you just speak your truth. You got to be you. Im not trying to win everybody over because some people dont resonate with who I am or what I say. And some people go, Fuck, yeah, thats the guy I want to hang out with. And I find that if youre just honest with who you are, then youll find the right people in your life.

Yeah, because heres the whole that most agencies dont do. They do one or two things really well, right. They run ads really well. But then theres another problem.
